about_the_game:
3D Graphics, Simple Operation
Poly Survivor is a roguelike casual indie game with 3D graphics and super simple operation. Players will control their characters to continuously fire barrages and enjoy the fun of clearing out enemies in large numbers. During the battle, players will obtain different equipments and weapons to continuously strengthen themselves, and eventually destroy the enemy.

Various Environments
Players need to fight in environments such as winds and swamps. These environments not only affect players, but also monsters. Players will explore how to survive in various environments during the game.

Powerful Monsters
Players not only have to clear out the swarms of monsters, but also need to challenge and defeat several elite monsters. These elite monsters with different skills should be handled carefully.

Please send email to bestqgame@gmail.com or bestqgame@163.com if you have any advice or bugs to report. The author looks forward to communicating with players and will sincerely accept suggestions!

short_description: Hordes of monsters are threatening the Poly Village! Raise your weapons, choose your equipments and enjoy the battles……But be aware of those powerful monsters! Make full use of the environment and collect items continuously. Keep getting stronger until finally you defeat your enemies.
